name: fey
description: Fey is a boilerplate/engine for pixijs. Descendant of the great [REDACTED] engine

scripts.build:release: npm run build:assets && npm run downloadCsv && rimraf ./dist && webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build:debug: npm run build:assets && npm run downloadCsv && rimraf ./dist && webpack --config webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build:assets: npm run downloadCsv && assetpack -c .assetpack.mjs && npm run generateAssetTypes
scripts.test: echo "This moved to start instead of test" && exit 1
scripts.start: npm run build:assets && webpack serve --config webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.start:release: npm run build:assets && webpack serve --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.deploy: git pull && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && git checkout deploy && git pull && git merge master && git push && git checkout master
scripts.deploy:minor: git pull && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && git checkout deploy && git pull && git merge master && git push && git checkout master
scripts.deploy:major: git pull && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && git checkout deploy && git pull && git merge master && git push && git checkout master
scripts.prepare: git lfs update --force && husky install && git lfs pull && git config --replace-all core.autocrlf false && git config --replace-all core.ignorecase false && git config --replace-all pull.rebase true && git config commit.template ./.tools/CommitTemplate

author: ElementalCode (Milton Candelero) @ [REDACTED]
